string.value: The Policeman you met at Midnight Harbor in the year 2099 wants you to find the Shelter Key and deliver it to Captain Edmond, who is somewhere at the harbor.

The Policeman you met at Midnight Harbor in the year 2099 asked you to find the Shelter Key and deliver it to Captain Edmond. You retrieved the key from the monsters and gave it to Captain Edmond at the quayside.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 60,000\r\nCan participate in the "Temporary Measure" quest.\r\n

Could I ask you for one last favor? Everyone at the harbor was evacuated except one person. His name is Captain Edmond. He's stubborn and wouldn't cooperate. I think he remained behind, somewhere at the harbor. I must deliver the Shelter Key to him. Will you help me?
But there is one problem. I dropped the Shelter Key. I think one of the monsters might have picked it up. Could you find the Shelter Key and take it over to Captain Edmond?
I'm so worried about the captain. He's all alone right now.
What is it? What brings you here?\r\n#b#L0#I've come to give you the Shelter Key. It's dangerous here.#l\n#k
Nonsense! I'm fine. But I'll take the key.
Please retrieve the Shelter Key from the monsters and deliver it to Captain Edmond. He's somewhere at the harbor.
Please retrieve the Shelter Key from the monsters and deliver it to Captain Edmond. He's somewhere at the harbor.
